001275BF.VoiceDir5.B20BA: cold, leaning somber; distrubed by memories of war

0C1F7A21.Line13.B20BA: After years of quiet, it seems something survived that night. These bodies and the merchants were meant for me.

2AFD8914.Line7.B20BA: My kin, and our leader, Stana, did not share my shame. They delighted in the fires. Yearned for their return.

33FB68C3.VoiceDir9.B20BA: cold; distrubed by memories of war/death

5D201C8E.Line1.B20BA: Formerly. Donan sought able bodies and conscripted our lot to defeat Astaroth.

722B009F.Line11.B20BA: So I cut them down, one by one, and left them to be claimed by fire.

91090F92.Line5.B20BA: But the things I saw… humbled and horrified every part of me.

C4F20296.Line9.B20BA: I was there when they set upon Brione. Saw the madness in their eyes. The Days of Ash had taken their minds.

F7149610.Line3.B20BA: Our ruthless tactics were put to measure, and, with time, the demon was defeated.
